title: [CTM] CryptoTrafficMarket
author: [CTM] CryptoTrafficMarket
created_time: October 16, 2023, 01:04:29 PMLast edit: November 04, 2024, 07:49:59 PM by [CTM] CryptoTrafficMarket

comments.author: Angry_Kitty
comments.body: Now there are so many different companies and projects that without promotion it is impossible to survive.

comments.author: cryptosru
comments.body: Quote from: Angry_Kitty on October 16, 2023, 06:42:12 PMNow there are so many different companies and projects that without promotion it is impossible to survive.Now during the fall of the market it is very difficult time for all cryptocurrency projects but promotion is necessary in all the times even during the fall of the market.

comments.author: alan228
comments.body: Quote from: cryptosru on October 17, 2023, 07:27:04 AMQuote from: Angry_Kitty on October 16, 2023, 06:42:12 PMNow there are so many different companies and projects that without promotion it is impossible to survive.Now during the fall of the market it is very difficult time for all cryptocurrency projects but promotion is necessary in all the times even during the fall of the market.Promotion is necessary in all the time even during the fall of the market because only best projects will be able to survive during the fall of the market and to do this promotion is necessary.

comments.author: Immobilium
comments.body: It is necessary to remember that without promotion people will not know about all your products and results. That is why it is not enough to create a product it is necessary to promote it.

comments.author: Corsac
comments.body: Quote from: Immobilium on October 19, 2023, 08:13:06 AMIt is necessary to remember that without promotion people will not know about all your products and results. That is why it is not enough to create a product it is necessary to promote it.Promotion is important part of development of every project. Sometimes without promotion it is impossible to survive every project because people will not use the project and its product if they will not know about it.

comments.author: alan228
comments.body: Quote from: Corsac on October 20, 2023, 02:02:04 PMQuote from: Immobilium on October 19, 2023, 08:13:06 AMIt is necessary to remember that without promotion people will not know about all your products and results. That is why it is not enough to create a product it is necessary to promote it.Promotion is important part of development of every project. Sometimes without promotion it is impossible to survive every project because people will not use the project and its product if they will not know about it.Sometimes it is more important to pay more attention to promotion than to development. The more attention to the project the more promotion the more people will know about the project.

comments.author: daxetoken
comments.body: Quote from: alan228 on October 21, 2023, 09:48:23 AMSometimes it is more important to pay more attention to promotion than to development. The more attention to the project the more promotion the more people will know about the project.Now there are so many companies that offer promotion that is why it is necessary to choose the company that are really useful and will be able to promote the company.
